findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeAccount and _getCurrentSupply use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively, which can cause OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there are long excluded addresses lists.
